title: Tropical Mauritius Beachfront Retreat with Eight Restaurants & Bars & Award-Winning Spa
description:
Nestled along Mauritius’ tranquil west coast is a tropical sanctuary where French Zest meets the local culture, all with a backdrop of lush gardens, powder sands and crystal-clear water. A stay at Sofitel Mauritius L'Impérial Resort & Spa is a masterclass in escapism -indulge in five exquisite restaurants and three stylish bars, or rejuvenate your senses at the award-winning Sofitel Spa while your kids stay entertained at the Kids' Club with its very own pool.

Leave your patch of paradise to explore the vibrant local markets of Port Louis, renowned for their colourful textiles, handcrafted jewellery and aromatic spices. For the nature enthusiasts, the Pamplemousses Botanical Garden, home to a myriad of exotic plants and rare bird species, is a must-visit. Bask in breathtaking sunsets on the pristine beach, swim among vibrant marine life, or simply unwind in a private sanctuary of relaxation.

title: Mauritius All-Villa Beachfront Oasis with Four Restaurants & Spa
description:
Escape to the powder-fine shores of the West Coast of Mauritius with a stay at this opulent all-villa resort. Spread across 24 acres of native land with 750 metres of beachfront, this intimate haven offers private pool villas perfect for both romantic and family retreats.

Savour the finest international and local cuisine at one of four onsite restaurants, or rejuvenate your senses at the spa, boasting relaxing wet areas and holistic treatments. A short drive away, discover the vibrant markets of Port Louis or the enchanting Pamplemousses Botanical Gardens.
